title: CODESA
description: This is an example of i18n in React with Vite.
deleteConfirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to delete?

cta.title: Discover the Convenience of Public Transport
cta.subTitle: Explore our routes and schedules to plan your trip efficiently and comfortably. With CODESA, you will always arrive on time.

features.title: Main Features
features.routesDescription: Check out our routes and schedules to plan your trip efficiently. We offer a wide variety of lines covering the main areas of San Carlos, Punta del Este and Maldonado.
features.trackingDescription: Monitor the location of our buses in real time with our advanced satellite tracking system. This technology allows you to know exactly where your bus is and how much time is left until it arrives at your stop.
features.notificationsDescription: Receive instant notifications about changes in schedules, fares and special services. Stay informed about any eventuality that may affect your trip.
features.ratesDescription: We offer competitive and affordable rates for all our transportation services. Check out our rates and find out which payment options best suit your needs.
features.serviceDescription: We provide excellent customer service to answer all your questions and queries. Our team is always available to help you with any problems or questions you may have.
features.securityDescription: Garantizamos la seguridad de nuestros pasajeros en cada viaje. Nuestros ómnibus están equipados con las últimas tecnologías de seguridad y son operados por conductores altamente capacitados.

slider.title: Customer Service
slider.subTitle: Our team is here to help you with any questions or issues. Contact us and receive personalized assistance!

news.title: Latest News
news.subTitle: Stay Informed with the Latest Updates

contact.title: Need help?
contact.subTitle: Our support team will get back to you ASAP via email.

subscribe.title: Subscribe to receive future updates
subscribe.subTitle: Receive the latest news directly to your email
subscribe.note: No spam guaranteed, So please don’t send any spam mail.
